to mirror the colors to make the blanket symmetrical start the second cake at the same color where the first cake ran out turquoise blue in the sample you may have to pull the yarn from the outside of the cake instead of the inside or vice versa to use the colors in the opposite order as your first cake you may also have to make one cut in the second cake to start with the right color for example my first cake started with purple and ended at turquoise blue four mandala fun crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful to make the second half of the blanket a mirror image of the first half i must start my next cake at turquoise blue and end at purple to do this i cut the second cake in half at the point where the turquoise blue meets purple i started crocheting the second half of the blanket by pulling the turquoise blue from the center of the half cake on the left when that half cake ran out at the yellow i started crocheting from the half cake on the right by pulling the yellow from the center of the cake after 2 cakes after 3 cakes four mandala fun crochet pattern © 2020 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful to add a new cake or work around a knot use the russian join method to add a new cake you will need a yarn needle a hook and scissors if you find a knot cut the knot out and rejoin the yarn with this method video link below 1 thread one yarn end onto the needle then insert the needle into the same piece of yarn about an inch back from the needle 2 weave the needle back and forth through the yarn a few times splitting the yarn in half as you poke the needle through insert your hook into the loop closest to the eye of the needle so you don t lose this loop 3 pull the needle through keeping the loop on the hook four mandala fun crochet pattern ©
